mapper.select: SELECT cs.model_id , md.name as model_name, cs.component_partial_id, cs.identify_code, cs.safety_lever from component_setting cs join model md on md.model_id = cs.model_id order by model_id;

select cs.model_id ,vm.CATEGORY_NAME as category_name ,vm.NAME as model_name ,pm.code as component_code ,IFNULL(cs.safety_lever, 0) as safety_lever ,IFNULL(cm.cnt_partial_step0, 0) as cnt_partial_step0 ,IFNULL(cm.cnt_partial_step1, 0) as cnt_partial_step1 ,IFNULL(cm.cnt_partial_step2, 0) as cnt_partial_step2 ,IFNULL(cm.cnt_partial_step3, 0) as cnt_partial_step3 ,ppc.partial_code as partial_code from component_setting cs left join ( select cm1.model_id , sum(if(step=0,1,0)) as cnt_partial_step0 , sum(if(step=1,1,0)) as cnt_partial_step1 , sum(if(step=2,1,0)) as cnt_partial_step2 , sum(if(step=3,1,0)) as cnt_partial_step3 from component_manage cm1 where cm1.step < 4 group by model_id ) cm on cs.model_id = cm.model_id left join ( select pp.model_id, group_concat(pm2.code separator ' ') as partial_code from premake_partial pp left join partial pm2 on pp.partial_id = pm2.partial_id where pp.standard_flg = 3 group by model_id ) ppc on ppc.model_id = cs.model_id left join v_model vm on cs.model_id = vm.MODEL_ID left join partial pm on cs.component_partial_id = pm.partial_id order by model_name ASC

SELECT cs.model_id , md.name as model_name, cs.component_partial_id, cs.identify_code, cs.safety_lever FROM component_setting cs join model md on md.model_id = cs.model_id WHERE cs.model_id = #{model_id} ORDER BY model_id;

SELECT cs.model_id , md.name as model_name, cs.component_partial_id, cs.identify_code, cs.safety_lever FROM component_setting cs join model md on md.model_id = cs.model_id WHERE cs.identify_code = #{identify_code} ORDER BY model_id;

SELECT cs.model_id , md.name as model_name, cs.component_partial_id, pm.name as partial_name, pm.code as component_code, cs.identify_code, cs.safety_lever FROM component_setting cs join model md on md.model_id = cs.model_id join partial pm on cs.component_partial_id = pm.partial_id WHERE cs.model_id = #{model_id} ORDER BY model_id;
